title: Destination Meeting Management | CSI DMC Event Services | CSI DMC
text:
MEETING MANAGEMENT
GATHER
MEETINGS WELL MANAGED
We want to ensure that your meetings & conferences of every scope and size runs smoothly and efficiently. CSI DMC is your strategic partner in all aspects ranging from registration solutions to vendor management to ultimately achieving meeting goals. Meeting Management needs include:
Site Recommendation and/or Selection
Turnkey Registration Services
Graphic Design and Branding
Social Media Messaging
A-Z Logistics Management
Keynote and Speaker Coordination
Full-Scale Production, Design and Delivery
On-Site Management and Staffing
